LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerLanguageLearning.label: language learning
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerLanguageLearning.descript: The toddler is learning to talk and will gradually improve.
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerLanguageLearning.stages.0: The toddler is still very young and can only make indistinct sounds.
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerLanguageLearning.stages.1: The toddler just learned to call mom and is trying out simple words.
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerLanguageLearning.stages.2: The toddler can say one or two short sentences and express basic needs.
